title: Will the kabah do tawaf around the Prophet ﷺ‎ ? #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: I don't understand your question do are you asking me that one day Prophet Muhammad will do TA in the Kaa no no no no will ta the prophet around the prophet sallallahu alaihi wasallam oh the Kaaba itself will do ta around the prophet Alam yeah yeah I have heard it do do let me ask you do you think this is logical no illogical come on so don't ever repeat things you hear unless you hear them from trusted Scholars or you read it in trusted books of religion there is tons of misinformation or as our friend says fake news spreading all over the Internet social media and the enemies of Islam are trying to undermine it by such false information so don't pay attention take your religion not from Tik Tok not from YouTube and uh uh Facebook or Twitter take your religion from trusted Scholars of Islam from trusted sources of Quran Etc this is how you learn your religion and Allah Knows Best
